bibl.title: The Manuscripts of the Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin Preussischer Kulturbesitz. Part 4. Homiletic and Liturgical Manuscripts from the White Monastery

series.title: Verzeichnis der orientalischen Handschriften in Deutschland

bibl.note: See in part. pp. 217-221: Coptic documentary manuscripts [description of P. KRU 21 and 74].
bibl.seg: Paola Buzi, The Manuscripts of the Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin Preussischer Kulturbesitz. Part 4. Homiletic and Liturgical Manuscripts from the White Monastery = Coptic Manuscripts. 7 = Verzeichnis der orientalischen Handschriften in Deutschland. 21, 7.
Stuttgart, Franz Steiner Verlag, 2014, 4°, 274 pp., 7 pll. ISBN 978-3-515-10711-2. €68.
See in part. pp. 217-221: Coptic documentary manuscripts [description of P. KRU 21 and 74].
